name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience in crafting high-performance, responsive web applications. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and passionate about leveraging **Angular** for innovative web solutions. Strong understanding of **RESTful APIs** and adept with **Git** for collaborative development. Skilled in implementing **CI/CD** practices to streamline deployment processes, ensuring optimal performance and security.

My background includes designing scalable web architecture with a focus on responsive design and performance optimization. I have a proven track record of integrating complex functionalities while adhering to high standards of compliance. My robust problem-solving skills and dedication to continuous improvement have consistently driven successful outcomes in challenging environments.
